tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE HealthCareMetrics (
  metric_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  metric_name VARCHAR(100),
  metric_description TEXT,
  target_value FLOAT,
  actual_value FLOAT,
  target_achieved BOOLEAN,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE quality_assurance_metrics (
    id INT,
    metric_name VARCHAR(255),
    metric_value DECIMAL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE patient_care_standards (
    id INT,
    standard_name VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT,
    responsible_team VARCHAR(255),
    last_updated TIMESTAMP,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE QualityAssuranceMetrics (
    metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    metric_name VARCHAR(255),
    metric_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE PatientCareStandards (
    standard_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    standard_name VARCHAR(255),
    standard_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE PerformanceMetricsTracking (
    tracking_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    metric_id INT,
    standard_id INT,
    tracking_date DATE,
    tracking_result DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE HealthcareProviders (
    provider_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    provider_name VARCHAR(255),
    provider_type VARCHAR(100),
    provider_location VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE patient_records (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(255),
  patient_age INT,
  patient_gender VARCHAR(10),
  patient_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE healthcare_providers (
  provider_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  provider_name VARCHAR(255),
  provider_specialty VARCHAR(50),
  provider_location VARCHAR(100),
  provider_contact VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE performance_analysis (
  analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  metric_id INT,
  qa_id INT,
  provider_id INT,
  analysis_result TEXT
);
